Title: Cheer Up Sleepy Gene
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger (teleplay by), H. Jon Benjamin (story by), Holly Schlesinger (story by)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Gene is nervous about going to his first sleepover and realizes he had a right to be when things don't go as planned.
